channel.description: Recent content in Amyc on UN-aligned

item.title: Is UK's North Sea Drilling Plan a Sustainable Solution? An Impact Assessment Report
item.author: amyc
item.description: The UK's North Sea oil strategy grapples with immediate energy benefits versus long-term environmental and economic costs, amid energy security and climate concerns.

item.title: ‘No Girl Left Behind’: How Taliban's Ban on Girls' Education Imperils Afghanistan's Future
item.author: amyc
item.description: The empty chairs in Afghanistan's classrooms don't just signify a local crisis; they mark a global failure that jeopardises the future of an entire generation and country.
